Antiarrhythmic drug profiles (==VERAPAMIL==)
################### Ion channels & IC50 #####################
ICaL	0.2
IK1	1000000
IKr	0.5
IKs	1000000
IKur	2.2	
INa	35
INaL	1000000
INaK	1000000
INCX	1000000
Ito	1000000
######################## AAD INFO ###########################
Antiarrhythmic drug class	IV
Effective range	0 - 10
